page.title: 04Church (cont.)
page.content: To help the rector in his work he has the assistance of a (Deaconess) who works full time in the parih, and also a lay Minister who assists with services and various meetings during the week. Other officers who help with the running of the church are included on a list which is published every month in the Parish news magazine under "See who's who".Each month a (Parish News Magazine is published. It tells you about various things taking place in the village.At the back of the magazine there is a childrens competion in which children can win money prizes.
